title: Office of the Director | NIST
snippet: Craig Burkhardt was appointed to serve as the Deputy Under Secretary of Commerce for Standards and Technology and NIST Deputy Director in January 2025.

title: NIST Names Shyam Sunder Associate Director for Laboratory Programs | NIST
snippet: GAITHERSBURG, Md. — The National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) announced that S. Shyam Sunder has been selected as its new associate director for laboratory programs (ADLP), effective June 1, 2025.

title: Craig Burkhardt | NIST
snippet: Craig Burkhardt returned to the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) at the U.S. Department of Commerce in January 2025 to serve a White House appointment as Deputy Under Secretary for Standards and Technology and Deputy NIST ...

title: NIST Senior Leadership | NIST
snippet: Craig Burkhardt was appointed to serve as the Deputy Under Secretary of Commerce for Standards and Technology and NIST Deputy Director in January 2025.

title: NIST Names Shyam Sunder Associate Director for Laboratory Programs
snippet: GAITHERSBURG, Md., June 26, 2025 — The National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) announced that S. Shyam Sunder has been selected as its new associate director for laboratory programs […]
